mapper.select: select * from emp e, dept d where e.dno = d.dno and id=#{id} and password=#{password}
mapper.insert: insert into emp(ename, position, dno, birthday, address, mobile, hiredate, acou_name, acount, id, password, gender) values(#{ename},#{position},(select dno from dept where dname=#{dname}),#{birthday},#{address},#{mobile},to_date(#{hireDate}),#{acou_name},#{acount},#{id},#{password},#{gender})
mapper.select: select * from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(emp eno)*/ rownum rn, e.*, d.dname from emp e, dept d where e.dno = d.dno and rownum <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount})) where rn > ((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}) order by hiredate desc, eno desc
select count(*) from emp where eno>0

select * from (select /*+INDEX_DESC(emp eno)*/ rownum rn, e.*, d.dname from emp e, dept d where e.dno = d.dno and ename like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and rownum <= (#{pageNum}*#{amount})) where rn > ((#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}) order by hiredate desc, eno desc
select count(*) from emp where eno>0 and ename like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select e.*, d.dname from emp e, dept d where e.dno = d.dno and eno=#{eno}
mapper.update: update emp set ename=#{ename}, dno=(select dno from dept where dname=#{dname}), position=#{position}, birthday=#{birthday}, mobile=#{mobile}, id=#{id}, password=#{password}, address=#{address}, hiredate=#{hireDate}, leavedate=#{leaveDate}, acou_name=#{acou_name}, acount=#{acount}, gender=#{gender} where eno=#{eno}
